Augment.Name: Legendary Demonheart Emerald
Augment.Description: Improved Demonic Shield. Each time you are hit in melee combat there is a chance that a shield of demonic energy will grant you a +120 Profane bonus to temporary hit points.

Augment.Name: Legendary Wraithborn Emerald
Augment.Description: Ghostly. Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee and missile attacks do not roll a miss chance or incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 10% chance to miss due to incorporeality. Hide and Move Silently skills receive a +5 enhancement bonus.

Augment.Name: Legendary Arrowbound Topaz
Augment.Description: +8% Enhancement bonus to Doubleshot chance

Augment.Name: Legendary Swordcrossed Topaz
Augment.Description: +15% Enhancement bonus to Doublestrike chance

Augment.Name: Topaz of Necromantic Power
Augment.Description: +6 Equipment bonus to Necromancy DCs.

Augment.Name: Topaz of Evocation Power
Augment.Description: +6 Equipment bonus to Evocation DCs.

Augment.Name: Topaz of Enchanted Power
Augment.Description: +6 Equipment bonus to Enchantment DCs.

Augment.Name: Topaz of Illusory Power
Augment.Description: +6 Equipment bonus to Illusion DCs.

Augment.Name: Topaz of Abjuration Power
Augment.Description: +6 Equipment bonus to Abjuration DCs.

Augment.Name: Topaz of Conjured Power
Augment.Description: +6 Equipment bonus to Conjuration DCs.

Augment.Name: Topaz of Transmuted Power
Augment.Description: +6 Equipment bonus to Transmutation DCs.

Augment.Name: Legendary Silvertongue Sapphire
Augment.Description: Linguistics 15%. This item reduces the cooldowns of your Social skills (Diplomacy, Bluff, Intimidate) by 15%

Augment.Name: Legendary Undying Sapphire
Augment.Description: Bound to service beyond death, you gain a +225 enhancement bonus to your Incapacitation range.

Augment.Name: Legendary Convalescent Ruby
Augment.Description: +100 Equipment Bonus to each individual Spell Power.

Augment.Name: Brightbane Emerald
Augment.Description: Command. This armor or shield always appears brilliant and gleaming, no matter what he conditions and despite all attempts to paint over or obscure it. Coveted by military leaders of all sorts, it carries a powerful aura that grants a +5 Insight bonus on Charisma-based skill checks. Command armor and command shields make their owners very noticeable, imposing a -6 penalty on Hide checks.

Augment.Name: Voidscale
Augment.Description: +5% Exceptional bonus to Universal Spell Lore

Augment.Name: Silverscale
Augment.Description: +56 Enhancement bonus to each Positive/Negative/Repair Amplification

Augment.Name: Goldscale
Augment.Description: +150% Enhancement bonus to Fortification

Augment.Name: Bronzescale
Augment.Description: You have Deathblock and Ghostly

Augment.Name: Fragment of Extra-planar Alignment
Augment.Description: +23% Enhancement bonus to Alignment absorption, which includes Law, Chaos, Good, and Evil damage.

Augment.Name: Fragment of Extra-planar Shadow
Augment.Description: +3% Profane Doublestrike and Doubleshot, +15% Enhancement bonus to Melee Alacrity, +20% Enhancement bonus to Ranged Alacrity.

Augment.Name: Horn: +12 Resistance
Augment.Description: +12 resistance bonus to all saves

Augment.Name: Horn: Profane DCs
Augment.Description: +2 Profane bonus to Spell DCs

Augment.Name: Horn: Relentless Fury
Augment.Description: While this item is equipped, any killing blows you strike against enemies may drive you into a furious rage, providing a 5% Enhancement damage bonus to your melee, ranged and unarmed attacks for 30 seconds. Slaying weaker opponents has a reduced chance of producing this effect.

Augment.Name: Horn: Sacred DCs
Augment.Description: +2 Sacred bonus to Spell DCs

Augment.Name: Horn: Enhanced Ghostly
Augment.Description: Equipping this item causes you to become partially incorporeal. Your melee attacks do not roll a miss chance for Incorporeal targets. Enemy attacks have a 15% chance to miss you due to incorporeality. You receive a +5 enhancement bonus to your Hide and Move Silently skills.

Augment.Name: Horn: +286 Wizardry
Augment.Description: +286 Enhancement Bonus to Spell Points. If you have Sorcerer or Favored Soul levels, you gain additional spell points proportionate to the ratio of those levels to other classes.

Augment.Name: Horn: Dimensional Horn
Augment.Description: +5% Enhancement bonus to Dodge Bypass.

Augment.Name: Horn: Fossilized Amber
Augment.Description: +250 Unconsciousness Range. You heal 20 HP every minute from Positive Energy.

Augment.Name: MeltScale
Augment.Description: Adds Crystal and Byeshk material types. On Hit: +15d6 Acid Damage

Augment.Name: Iridescent Scale
Augment.Description: +102 Equipment bonus to all Spell powers. IF this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +2 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs.

Augment.Name: Brightscale
Augment.Description: +9 Enhancement bonus to Spell Penetration. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +2 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs.

Augment.Name: Shadowscale
Augment.Description: +10% Enhancement bonus to Spell Cost Reduction. If this is slotted in a Quarterstaff, also grants a +2 Exceptional bonus to Spell DCs.

Augment.Name: Icescale
Augment.Description: Adds Cold Iron material type. On Hit: +15d6 Cold Damage

Augment.Name: Sparkscale
Augment.Description: Adds Silver material type. On Hit: +15d6 Electric Damage

Augment.Name: Flamescale
Augment.Description: Adds Adamantine material type. On Hit: +15d6 Fire Damage

Augment.Name: Brightfang
Augment.Description: Attacks and spells have a chance to deal untyped damage.

Augment.Name: Flamefang
Augment.Description: Adds Good alignment bypass. Your attacks and spells have a small chance to deal a large amount of Fire damage.

Augment.Name: Icefang
Augment.Description: Adds Chaotic alignment bypass. Attacks and spells have a chance to inflict 10 stacks of Cold damage over time.

Augment.Name: Iridescent Fang
Augment.Description: Spell Focus Mastery +5. On quarterstaff also +5 Exceptional bonus to Spell Critical Chance.

Augment.Name: Meltfang
Augment.Description: Evil bypass. Attacks and spells can deal stacking Acid DoT.

Augment.Name: Shadowfang
Augment.Description: Attacks and spells can Curse, dealing Untyped damage over time.

Augment.Name: Sparkfang
Augment.Description: Lawful bypass. Attacks and spells have small chance to deal large electric damage.

Augment.Description: Attacks and offensive spells can grant you 1000 temporary HP.

Augment.Name: Icehorn
Augment.Description: Freezing Ice

Augment.Name: Shadowhorn
Augment.Description: Attacks and offensive spells can reduce enemy PRR and MRR

Augment.Name: Sparkhorn
Augment.Description: Attacks and offensive spells can inflict multiple stacks of Vulnerability

Augment.Name: Aspect of Tar
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to reduce enemy Physical and Magical Resistance Rating and summon Tar oozes to your aid.

Augment.Name: Black Sands' Desire
Augment.Description: Your attacks and offensive spells have a chance to significantly slow your enemies.
